name: TestROOM
description:
TestROOM

A puzzle platformer where time is not in your favor. Beat the ten levels and collect as many points as you can to be the best one, the levels goes in a random order each play.

Made for LDJAM37 in 48hours.

Please vote and give feedback.


Code, Art, Design - Jeuiop

Music - PineMach


LudumDare page:

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=p...

Controls:

WASD - Movement

WASD + Jump - Move Objects

Q - Exit game
